maqras.text: Indeed human est est anxious
Si touched adversity despondent
Si beatus wealth stingy
Absque pro worshipers
Qui semper observe their contact prayers (Salat)
Part their moneta est set aside
Pro poor needy
They believe in Feria Judgment
They reverence their Dominus requital
Their Dominus requital non taken pro granted
They keep their chastity
(They habet relations) unus their conjux quod est jure theirs
anyone transgresses these limits est sinner
believers keep their word they est trustworthy
Their testimony est truthful
They consistently observe their contact prayers (Salat) on temporis
They deserved position honor Paradise
Quod keeping those est disbelieved ligatus vos
To the statim to sinister they flee
Quam potuit any de them expect iniit blissful Paradise
Nunquam; nos created them they know ex quod
Ego solemnly juravit Dominus de easts wests; nos est able
to substitute bene people tuus locus; nos nunquam defeated
Ergo let them blunder play they meet feria awaiting them
Ut est feria they advenit graves in ut hurry prout si herded (sacrificial) altare
Cum their eyes subdued shame cover them. Ut est feria awaiting them
Nos sent Noah his people Vos warn tuus people painful retribution afflicts them
He dictus O my people ego est manifest warner to vos
To alert vos ut vos worship DEUS reverence Eum obey me
He tunc forgive vos tuus sins respite vos pro predetermined period! multus assuredly deus appointment nunquam delayed dodum it est due vos unus knew
He dictus My Dominus ego invited my people nox feria
my invitation unus increased their aversion
Whenever ego invited them forgiven Vos they locus their fingers their ears covered themselves cum their clothes insisted turned arrogant
Tunc ego invited them publicly
Tunc ego proclaimed them loudly ego spoke to them privately
Ego dictus Implore tuus Dominus forgiveness; He Forgiving
â€˜He tunc shower vos generously rain
Provisus vos moneta infans orchards streams
Why vos non strive should reverence DEUS
He est Unus created vos in stages
Vos non realize ut DEUS created 7 universes in perfecit layers
He designed moon therein est light locus sun est lamp
Deus germinated vos terra plants
Tunc He returns vos it He surely bring vos out
DEUS factus TERRA habitable VOS
Ut vos build via therein
Noah dictus My Dominus they disobeyed me subsequentis those est et corrupted when beatus moneta infans
They schemed terrible schemes
They dictus non relinquit tuus deus! Non relinquit Wadd Suwaa Yaghouth Ya ooq Nasr
They misled multus. Ergo let wicked plunge deeper into loss
Because de their sins they drowned assigned hellfire. They non invenit helpers protect them DEUS
Noah alias dictus My Dominus non sinister single disbeliever terra
Si vos let them they unus mislead tuus servus dedit genitus to nihil wicked disbelievers
My Dominus forgive me my parentes anyone iniit my domus prout believer totus believing vir femina! Non dedit disbelievers anything annihilation
